body:
Comment 1: 
Sorry, but this is doing exactly what it should: you have codereview
enabled, there is a codereview.cfg file in the repository, and yet the
remote repo is not a URL.  This is a common mistake made by
Go developers, and it is detecting that situation.

You can work around this by deleting lib/codereview/codereview.cfg from your
local copy of the Go repository or by moving the codereview extension
into per-repository .hg/hgrc files instead of your ~/.hgrc.

Russ
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
